If a mod- erate or severe substance use disorder is comorbid with the substance intoxication delirium, the 4th position character is Delirium 293 “2,” and the clinician should record “moderate [substance] use disorder” or “severe [substance] use disorder,” depend- ing on the severity of the comorbid substance use disorder.
